properties.description: This connection will help us to pick up the input files from the data folder of input container
This will copy multiple tables from azure sql database to azure sql dw

copySink.preCopyScript:
BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[Address]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[Address] ([CountryRegion] nvarchar(50),
[PostalCode] nvarchar(15),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime,
[AddressID] int,
[AddressLine1] nvarchar(60),
[AddressLine2] nvarchar(60),
[City] nvarchar(30),
[StateProvince] nvarchar(50));

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[Customer]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[Customer] ([EmailAddress] nvarchar(50),
[Phone] nvarchar(25),
[PasswordHash] varchar(128),
[PasswordSalt] varchar(10),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime,
[FirstName] nvarchar(50),
[MiddleName] nvarchar(50),
[LastName] nvarchar(50),
[Suffix] nvarchar(10),
[CompanyName] nvarchar(128),
[SalesPerson] nvarchar(256),
[CustomerID] int,
[NameStyle] bit,
[Title] nvarchar(8));

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[CustomerAddress]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] ([CustomerID] int,
[AddressID] int,
[AddressType] nvarchar(50),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime);

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[Product]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[Product] ([ProductID] int,
[ThumbNailPhoto] varbinary(8000),
[ThumbnailPhotoFileName] nvarchar(50),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime,
[Weight] decimal(8,2),
[ProductCategoryID] int,
[ProductModelID] int,
[SellStartDate] datetime,
[SellEndDate] datetime,
[DiscontinuedDate] datetime,
[Name] nvarchar(50),
[ProductNumber] nvarchar(25),
[Color] nvarchar(15),
[StandardCost] money,
[ListPrice] money,
[Size] nvarchar(5));

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[ProductCategory]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[ProductCategory] ([rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime,
[ProductCategoryID] int,
[ParentProductCategoryID] int,
[Name] nvarchar(50));

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[ProductModel]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[ProductModel] ([ProductModelID] int,
[Name] nvarchar(50),
[CatalogDescription] varchar(8000),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime);

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[ProductModelProductDescription]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[ProductModelProductDescription] ([ProductModelID] int,
[ProductDescriptionID] int,
[Culture] nchar(6),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime);

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail] ([SalesOrderID] int,
[SalesOrderDetailID] int,
[OrderQty] smallint,
[ProductID] int,
[UnitPrice] money,
[UnitPriceDiscount] money,
[LineTotal] decimal(38,6),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime);

BEGIN TRY
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'SalesLT') EXEC('Create Schema [SalesLT]');
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
if ERROR_NUMBER() <> 2714 throw;
END CATCH

IF OBJECT_ID('[SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader]', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader] ([SalesOrderID] int,
[RevisionNumber] tinyint,
[OrderDate] datetime,
[DueDate] datetime,
[ShipDate] datetime,
[Status] tinyint,
[TotalDue] money,
[Comment] nvarchar(4000),
[rowguid] uniqueidentifier,
[ModifiedDate] datetime,
[BillToAddressID] int,
[ShipMethod] nvarchar(50),
[CreditCardApprovalCode] varchar(15),
[SubTotal] money,
[TaxAmt] money,
[Freight] money,
[OnlineOrderFlag] bit,
[SalesOrderNumber] nvarchar(25),
[PurchaseOrderNumber] nvarchar(25),
[AccountNumber] nvarchar(15),
[CustomerID] int,
[ShipToAddressID] int);

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 split(ProductCategoryID >=10 && ProductCategoryID<=20,
	ProductCategoryID >= 30 && ProductCategoryID <=50,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Pcat20, Pcat50, Others)
ConditionalSplit1@Pcat20 sink(input(
		BookId as string,
		Name as string,
		Author as string,
		Price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@Pcat50 sink(input(
		BookId as string,
		Name as string,
		Author as string,
		Price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Others sink(input(
		BookId as string,
		Name as string,
		Author as string,
		Price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink3
